title: Opening a data set
body:
#### Code Sample

<!-- Should be a copy-pastable example if possible -->

```stata
clear all
set more off
set matsize 11000
cap log close

global base "/Volumes/GoogleDrive/My Drive/RA/Elberg/Slotting Allowances/Supplier Level"
global original "$base/original"
global intermediate "$base/intermediate"
global latex "$base/latex"

log using "$latex/merge_and_prepare.log", replace
************************************** Prepare data bases ******************************************
use "$original/Ingresos_Cd_form.dta", clear

```
#### Problem description

Hi, I'm having issues opening a data base (on Mac). The code works on stata. But when I try to use stata_kernel it doesn't work. I thought that maybe the problem is that I'm using a google drive folder, but the code works when I use other data bases. Maybe the problem is that the data base is "big" (~7GB). 

Atom shows the following: 

#### Debugging log

[IPKernelApp] ERROR | Exception in message handler: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pexpect/expect.py", line 111, in expect_loop incoming = spawn.read_nonblocking(spawn.maxread, timeout) File "/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pexpect/pty_spawn.py", line 482, in read_nonblocking raise TIMEOUT('Timeout exceeded.') pexpect.exceptions.TIMEOUT: Timeout exceeded.

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

Traceback (most recent call last): File "/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ipykernel/kernelbase.py", line 233, in dispatch_shell handler(stream, idents, msg) File "/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/ipykernel/kernelbase.py", line 399, in execute_request user_expressions, allow_stdin) File "/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/stata_kernel/kernel.py", line 92, in do_execute self.completions.refresh(self) File "/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/stata_kernel/completions.py", line 74, in refresh self.suggestions = self.get_suggestions(kernel) File "/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/stata_kernel/completions.py", line 261, in get_suggestions match = self.matchall(self.quickdo('_StataKernelCompletions', kernel)) File "/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/stata_kernel/completions.py", line 290, in quickdo text_to_run, md5, text_to_exclude=text_to_exclude, display=False) File "/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/stata_kernel/stata_session.py", line 185, in do rc, res = self.expect(text=text, child=child, md5=md5, **kwargs) File "/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/stata_kernel/stata_session.py", line 230, in expect match_index = child.expect(expect_list, timeout=5) File "/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pexpect/spawnbase.py", line 341, in expect timeout, searchwindowsize, async_) File "/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pexpect/spawnbase.py", line 369, in expect_list return exp.expect_loop(timeout) File "/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pexpect/expect.py", line 119, in expect_loop return self.timeout(e) File "/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pexpect/expect.py", line 82, in timeout raise TIMEOUT(msg) pexpect.exceptions.TIMEOUT: Timeout exceeded.

<pexpect.pty_spawn.spawn object at 0x114ae7c50> command: /Applications/Stata/StataMP.app/Contents/MacOS/stata-mp args: [b'/Applications/Stata/StataMP.app/Contents/MacOS/stata-mp'] buffer (last 100 chars): ''

after: match: None match_index: None exitstatus: None flag_eof: False pid: 997 child_fd: 66 closed: False timeout: 30 delimiter: logfile: <_io.TextIOWrapper name='/Users/fernandoochoa/.stata_kernel_cache/console_debug.log' mode='w' encoding='US-ASCII'> logfile_read: None logfile_send: None maxread: 2000 ignorecase: False searchwindowsize: None delaybeforesend: None delayafterclose: 0.1 delayafterterminate: 0.1 searcher: searcher_re: 0: re.compile(". `bcc4869c9c119320f7af8a3981776720'") 1: re.compile('^r\((\d+)\);') 2: re.compile('\(file (/Users/fernandoochoa/.stata_kernel_cache/graph\d+\.(svg|png)) written in (?i:(svg|png)) format\)') 3: re.compile('^--more--') 4: re.compile('\r?\n') 5: EOF


#### Package Version

1.4.1
